_sText:
DeathRun Crash bandicoot Egypt V1
=================================
By FireWavezZ
-------------
The map is allmost completely custom made, it has the crash bandicoot theme and feeling of the egyptian levels from crash bandicoot warped. the crates in specific are made from scratch in PS. all other texture come from my other texture pack and edited in the style of the map.

Some map info:

- 45 CT / 2 T
- 16 traps with button
- A few other traps working on map spawn/trigger
- 3 secret nades of which 1 have the Aku-Aku mask tracing you.
- The map is split in 2 Area levels using Teleport
- 4 minigames at the end: Bunny hop, Knife, AWP, Punishment.
- Fun music from Crash B. Plays after entering a minigame
- AFK killer Aku_Aku after 90sec will follow a path and kill every CT that's left behind, slowly.
- 3d skybox
- Custom skybox(by me)
- Custom textures(be me)
- Custom prop(by SM_Sith_Lord)

If any bugs please contact me, The map works 100% without any special server settings, also works perfectly for DR servers, but might be a problem for MG servers.

I want to thank special NeXxXuS and Shrike from .Bad network. server. the map is on rotation there: 85.114.137.91:27115
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

please try it out!^^
====================
